Installation & setup.heading: Dashboard Walkthrough
Installation & setup.DetailsText:
Pre-installation requirements:
  1. Register to SaleAssist Dashboard
  2. Make sure you have access to your website's admin panel.
  3. The SaleAssist Dashboard helps you to interact with your clients, show them the products on live call and monitor your analytics data.

Installation steps:
  1. After you register, go to the 'Assets' tab:


Header Section: -

Availability Status: This is to set your status to Online OR Offline
Home: This is to go to Dashboard.Leads: This is to go to the Leads section where you can see all new and old leads and their conversations happened in the past.
Assets: - This button is to go to all backend settings for Widgets, Products, Media and Orders.
Notifications: - This is for all the alerts in your account.

Settings: - Above is the reference for the settings section where you can see Organization Settings, change password, Switch Organization (if you are part of multiple organizations), Resources for learning more about SaleAssist.
Logout: - Logout from SaleAssist.ai dashboard.
Let's go briefly over the Dashboardâ€™s tabs. Starting with the Meetings section:

New Meetings :- Create instant meetings like google meet or any other meeting platform to connect with anyone like a customer or team member.

Schedule Meetings :- Schedule meetings with your customers.

Live Stream :- Go Live by creating a live stream and the same stream can go live on multiple social channels at the same time.

Refer:- Refer meeting URLs with anyone to whom you want to join the same call.
Leads/Streams/Users:-

Above is the section where you can select options from Leads, Streams OR Users.
Users are the Agents invited to your organization or your team members.
Leads are the captured leads in your account.
Streams is the section where you can see the public chat coming during a live streaming show.

GetStarted.heading: Login Page
GetStarted.DetailsText: To begin first you need to visit the SaleAssist.ai website and click on the login button.

GetStarted.heading: Login / Sign Up
GetStarted.DetailsText: Here you can quickly sign up with your Google account.

GetStarted.heading: Dashboard
GetStarted.DetailsText: Once you are done, you would be landing on the meeting section where you could see all the options to schedule or have an instant meeting.

GetStarted.heading: Widgets
GetStarted.DetailsText: First you need to click on widgets on your left panel.

GetStarted.heading: Widget Lists
GetStarted.DetailsText: Here you can see many pre-configured widgets available.

GetStarted.heading: Widget Configurations
GetStarted.DetailsText: You can click on website inquiries widget and look at various configuration options which are available starting from changing the user interfaces, changing the names of the widget, descriptions, etc.
So here we are just putting a widget name, we can configure by choosing a different color matching your theme. We can upload a video or you can also put a video URL as a welcome video.
Here you can also see there are channels which are available which you can choose to give your client options to connect with you.
Then you can also put different configurations by which you can easily configure the widget and also choose a location on your website to show this widget.

GetStarted.heading: Integration Code
GetStarted.DetailsText: Once you have saved all the configurations, you can go to the integration section.
Here you can see that there are different options available like downloading a QR code, viewing the campaign page, or viewing a jump page.

The integration codes are readily available as a widget, as a button or as an iframe. From here you can easily copy the code and add it to the Header <head> section of your website , Button on any specific product page and Iframe on any contact page respectively.

WidgetIntegration.heading: Widget Integration
WidgetIntegration.DetailsText: First you need to click on widgets on your left panel.

WidgetIntegration.heading: List of Widgets
WidgetIntegration.DetailsText: Here you can see many pre-configured widgets available.

WidgetIntegration.heading: Edit a Widget
WidgetIntegration.DetailsText: You can click on website inquiries and look at various configuration options which are available.

WidgetIntegration.heading: Widget
WidgetIntegration.DetailsText: You can configure  changes in the widget by clicking on the widget tab. Here you can change the widget name, colour matching your theme. You can upload a video or you can also put a video URL as a welcome video.
Here you can also see there are channels which are available which you can choose to give your client options to connect with you.
Then you can also put different configurations by which you can easily configure the widget and also choose a location where it will be visible on your website.

WidgetIntegration.heading: User Experience:
WidgetIntegration.DetailsText: Next to the Widget tab there is a second tab named User Experience, This is the lead capturing form where you can allow trigger messages and time. You can also modify the welcome message from here.You can also customise the form by dragging and  dropping.

WidgetIntegration.heading: Agent Mapping
WidgetIntegration.DetailsText: Next is the agent mapping tab, which is used to map the agents from the organisation. You can also adjust your working hours, working days and break hours from here.

WidgetIntegration.heading: Invite Agents
WidgetIntegration.DetailsText: To invite an agent to your organisation you need to go on:
WidgetIntegration.Image:
• Organisation
  • Access Control
  • Invite

All you need to do is add the agent's mail id and assign the role to them.

WidgetIntegration.heading: AI Bot
WidgetIntegration.DetailsText: Following the agent mapping, is the AI bot here you can add your FAQs and other options which you need the bot to answer the customer.

WidgetIntegration.heading: Nudges
WidgetIntegration.DetailsText: Nudges will some kind of  pop ups on your website. By allowing this, you can add your own discount coupons,any sale that is going on OR any information you want to publish and get customers attention to it.
WidgetIntegration.Image: If you donâ€™t want them you just need to uncheck them and save.

WidgetIntegration.heading: User Feedback
WidgetIntegration.DetailsText: User Feedback is a feedback form from the customer's side. Once the call is done,customers can give feedback and there are different ways to give feedback.
WidgetIntegration.Image:
• Video Feedback
  • Audio Feedback
  • Text Feedback
  • Feedback form.

You can also modify the form according to your preference.

WidgetIntegration.heading: Agent Feedback
WidgetIntegration.DetailsText: This is the feedback form from the agent side to fill in some checklist to update customerâ€™s behaviour and interest to follow up next time accordingly.

WidgetIntegration.heading: Campaign Page
WidgetIntegration.DetailsText: This is  a one page website builder where anyone can create their own one pager website.

ReachBackLeads.heading: Step 1
ReachBackLeads.DetailsText: As a first step, you can actually respond back to the customer by writing any text which will be directly delivered to the person on email alternatively you can make a phone call back to the person which is an outbound telephony call.

ReachBackLeads.heading: Step 2
ReachBackLeads.DetailsText: Next thing is you can also set up an instant video meet with the person by just sending an invite to the personâ€™s email ID or alternatively to their phone number.

ReachBackLeads.heading: Step 3
ReachBackLeads.DetailsText: Here from our meetings settings you can actually instantly create a meeting and put up an invite to the persons email ID or a phone number in real-time. The person can be notified about this particular meeting which they can join without any need to download or install any software, directly from their browser.

ReachBackLeads.heading: Step 4
ReachBackLeads.DetailsText: Each meeting has a unique link that you can click and copy the link and you can share them back essentially through our conversation panel.

ReachBackLeads.heading: Step 5
ReachBackLeads.DetailsText: So, you can essentially reach back to the customer through our conversation panel and then also either a phone call or through a message like an email message like this.
